subsetsum

Class SubsetSum

  • java.lang.Object
    • subsetsum.SubsetSum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class SubsetSum
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    SubsetSum is an algorithm that can form collection of subsets, of a specified type, from an input set. This new collection is then checked so that user receives the best matched subset, from the collection, to user's input value such as shopping budget or playlist duration or similar.
    Author:
    Foothill College, Veronika Cabalova Joseph
